an4.71:1.1: “Mendicants, when a mendicant has four things their practice is unfailing, and they have laid the groundwork for ending the defilements.
an4.71:1.3: It’s when a mendicant is ethical, learned, energetic, and wise.
an4.71:1.4: When a mendicant has these four things their practice is unfailing, and they have laid the groundwork for ending the defilements.”
